### Genomic feature:

run all features: 33 jobs

- 1000,000 runs
```{r, eval=FALSE}
library("huskeR")
files <- list.files(path="cache/features", pattern=".csv", full.names=TRUE)

run_Rcode(inputdf=data.frame(file=1:33, out=1), outdir="slurm-script", cmdno=1,
          rcodes = "profiling/4.popgen-feature/4.A.2_setup_feature_MCMC.R",
          rversion="3.5",
          base_shid = "MCMC_pops",
          email="yangjl0930@gmail.com", runinfo = c(TRUE, "jclarke", 2, "10G", "36:00:00"))


```
